configStructure.name: launch_file
configStructure.description: ROS Launch File to be imported into a ROS Info block.

configStructure.name: launch_path
configStructure.description:
ROS-readable location where launch file can be found.
Example: $(find uuv_trajectory_control)/launch/auv_geometric_tracking_controller.launch

configStructure.name: import_as_parameters
configStructure.description: Import arguments from launch file into a parameter block. Typically used for system-level parameters shared between many components.
